IVB_CFM_Box.synopsis: Shadowheart examines the mysterious puzzle box that she's been closely guarding. She has a mission to deliver this item to her cloister in Baldur's Gate, though doesn't truly know what it is. She tries to understand it, and possibly draws the attention of one of her companions - she shuts them down when they ask her about it, however. Note: a version this scene may have already occurred in the Druid Grove - this is a fallback that occurs at the party's campsite.
IVB_CFM_Box.how_to_trigger: To trigger:Recruit Shadowheart (From debug book or otherwise)Recon: oe qnight NIGHT_ShadowHeart_Box_2de162ec-4272-4750-945f-9d306c5ba0daGo to camp

CFM_Ultimatum.synopsis: Shadowheart appears at the player's campsite one night after they missed all other opportunites to recruit her in their party. She seems unhinged, paranoid - convinced that we intend to steal something important that she possesses. We may learn that the item she refers to is the mysterious cube - a sentient gith artefact that's manipulating her into appearing to us and forcing a confrontation. The cube contains the long-imprisoned spirit of a gith general, who wants to fall into our party's hands in an effort to eventually break free. He's forcing Shadowheart to either join the party or get killed by the party - either way, the cube will be where it wants to be.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight.synopsis:
(Note 1: this scene can play out from the perspective of Shadowheart, Lae'zel or a third avatar.
(Note 2: this scene features a time transition of a couple of hours. The first part takes place at camp in the evening before everyone retires. The second part occurs later the same night after everyone seemingly is asleep).(Note 3: for much of this scene after the time transition, either Shadowheart or Lae'zel is lying on the ground, being held at knife point by the other) A conflict between Shadowheart and Lae'zel comes to a head when Lae'zel learns Shadowheart has a gith artefact, She demands an explanation, but almost certainly doesn't receive one. Later, during the night, one of the two is awoken by the other, who holds them at knifepoint (this could be Shadowheart seeking to get rid of Lae'zel or Lae'zel demanding answers from Shadowheart). Things could turn violent, with one possibly killing the other and other party members possibly getting involved. Or they could bury the hatchet.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight.how_to_trigger: - Loadlevel Wld_Main_A- Add SH and LZ through debug book (as companions/avatars as needed)- Recon: oe qnight NIGHT_ShadowHeart_LaezelFight_a3445b22-7973-416b-b8a3-1856414589ea- Go to camp- Click on campfire

IVB_CFM_Box_62.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_62.text: Damn thing... it has to open, surely. It has to do something.

IVB_CFM_Box_77.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_Box_77.text: *You discreetly take the box from where you'd hidden it and turn it over in your hands.*
IVB_CFM_Box_77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Avatar SH takes out box, turns it over in her hands, examining it.

IVB_CFM_Box_45.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_Box_45.text: *The runes engraved on the black metal mean nothing to you. You keep examining it.*

IVB_CFM_Box_8.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_Box_8.text: *There are no openings, but for a brief moment, you think you feel something stir within.*

IVB_CFM_Box_86.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_Box_86.text: *You tuck it away again. Your duty is to deliver it - not understand it.*
IVB_CFM_Box_86.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH puts the box away

IVB_CFM_Box_110.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_110.text: Damn thing... it has to open, surely. It has to do something.
IVB_CFM_Box_110.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Shadowheart turns the puzzle box over in her hands, looking for a way to open it while seated on the ground

IVB_CFM_Box_71.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_Box_71.text: *Shadowheart's attention is consumed by a strange box that she turns over in her hands.*

IVB_CFM_Box_61.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_Box_61.text: *Shadowheart's attention is consumed by a strange box that she turns over in her hands.*

IVB_CFM_Box_37.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_Box_37.text: *The box is inscribed with glyphs similar to those used by the githyanki.*

IVB_CFM_Box_93.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_93.text: A githyanki artefact. How did you come by that?

IVB_CFM_Box_30.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_30.text: My kin's heirlooms should not be in your hands.

IVB_CFM_Box_20.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_20.text: I could crack open that little thing in one fist, if you want me to.

IVB_CFM_Box_32.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_Box_32.text: *In an instant, Shadowheart hides the box from view.*
IVB_CFM_Box_32.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH puts the box away

IVB_CFM_Box_29.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_29.text: It's nothing, trust me. Interesting choice of camp we have here, isn't it? Peaceful.
IVB_CFM_Box_29.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval greater than 10 for the player.NodeContext: Airy, deflecting.

IVB_CFM_Box_49.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_49.text: You can really appreciate the quiet here. Not like in the city, where noise and life scarcely ever falls silent. It's not natural.
IVB_CFM_Box_49.context: NodeContext: A little philosophical (also keen to nudge conversation away from the gith artefact)

IVB_CFM_Box_57.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_57.text: Nothing like a little calm and quiet after all we've been through.

IVB_CFM_Box_43.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_43.text: To you, perhaps. For me, it's perfect. I think I'll enjoy it by myself for a while, if you don't mind.
IVB_CFM_Box_43.context: NodeContext:  Politely getting rid of the player.

IVB_CFM_Box_36.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_36.text: You can really appreciate the darkness out here in the wilds. Not like in the city, where they keep lamps burning all hours. It's not natural.
IVB_CFM_Box_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looks upward a little at the sky during the first sentence.NodeContext: A little philosophical (also keen to nudge conversation away from the gith artefact)

IVB_CFM_Box_33.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_33.text: I do like the dark. It's peaceful.

IVB_CFM_Box_7.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_7.text: Quite right. On that note, I think I'd like some time alone, if you don't mind. To meditate. We'll talk soon.
IVB_CFM_Box_7.context: InternalNodeContext: Shadowheart approval increases by oneNodeContext:  Politely getting rid of the player.

IVB_CFM_Box_66.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_66.text: No harm in brightening up the gloom. It's comforting, safe.

IVB_CFM_Box_64.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_64.text: To some, perhaps. But I'll enjoy the dark while I can. Alone, if you don't mind.

IVB_CFM_Box_19.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_19.text: I almost let you get away with changing the subject. Tell me about the artefact.

IVB_CFM_Box_106.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_106.text: You deserve honesty more than most... but please, don't ask.
IVB_CFM_Box_106.context: NodeContext: She gets on well with the player, but this isn't a secret she's willing to divulge.

IVB_CFM_Box_27.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_27.text: All right, I can respect that. But if you want to talk, I'm here.
IVB_CFM_Box_27.context: InternalNodeContext: Includes subnodes for really githyanki

IVB_CFM_Box_91.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_91.text: I can't promise that'll be any time soon, but thank you, all the same.
IVB_CFM_Box_91.context: NodeContext: Gratitude, with some slight guardedness.

IVB_CFM_Box_46.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_46.text: Not much of an answer. I'd hoped for more openness.
IVB_CFM_Box_46.context: InternalNodeContext: Includes subnodes for really githyanki

IVB_CFM_Box_10.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_10.text: I'm sorry. I can't give you that. Not right now.

IVB_CFM_Box_26.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_26.text: Why're you so keen to dodge questions about that thing?
IVB_CFM_Box_26.context: InternalNodeContext: Includes subnodes for really githyanki

IVB_CFM_Box_78.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_78.text: Use the parasite - see what she's hiding.

IVB_CFM_Box_70.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_Box_70.text: *You feel Shadowheart's deep protectiveness of the artefact. Though she doesn't understand it, she believes that her fate is entwined with it somehow.*

IVB_CFM_Box_90.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_90.text: Keep focused. Whatever that thing is, it's not important.

IVB_CFM_Box_39.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_39.text: That's not for you to decide. There's a world beyond us. I'd like to be alone now, please.

IVB_CFM_Box_35.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_35.text: Admit it - there's a cure for ceremorphosis in that thing, isn't there?
IVB_CFM_Box_35.context: InternalNodeContext: Intended as a joke - not a serious accusation

IVB_CFM_Box_6.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_6.text: Exactly. I'm just waiting for you to get really desperate before naming my price.
IVB_CFM_Box_6.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player increases by 5NodeContext: Amused, playing along with the player's joke accusartion.

IVB_CFM_Box_54.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_54.text: I'd like some time alone now. We'll talk soon.

IVB_CFM_Box_85.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_85.text: Remember, our fates are entwined now. Relics and secrets don't matter with what we're facing.

IVB_CFM_Box_69.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_69.text: I wish that was true. But I've seen plenty of blood spilled for just those kinds of things. The world will keep on scheming, no matter what happens to us.

IVB_CFM_Box_94.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_94.text: For someone so secretive, you really seem like you want to open up.

IVB_CFM_Box_51.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_51.text: I do. But I won't. Not yet.
IVB_CFM_Box_51.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is more than 10NodeContext: Torn. May be willing to open up eventually, but not yet.

IVB_CFM_Box_16.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_16.text: I do. But I won't. I can't.
IVB_CFM_Box_16.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is less than 10NodeContext: Torn.

IVB_CFM_Box_41.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_41.text: Don't be so cynical. It won't help us.

IVB_CFM_Box_53.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_53.text: It won't. But I prefer it to just being frightened. I'd like to be alone now, please.

IVB_CFM_Box_21.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_21.text: If you don't want to talk anymore, I'll respect that.

IVB_CFM_Box_109.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_109.text: Thank you. We can talk again soon.
IVB_CFM_Box_109.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player increases by 5

IVB_CFM_Box_101.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_101.text: I felt that - are you really surprised I won't open up when you keep trying to fumble in my head? Leave me alone.
IVB_CFM_Box_101.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player drops by 10  (first time caught using mindmeld)NodeContext: Sudden sharp anger. Caught the player trying to read her thoughts (second offence)

IVB_CFM_Box_44.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_44.text: I felt that - are you really surprised I won't open up when you try to fumble in my head? Leave me alone.
IVB_CFM_Box_44.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player drops by 5 (first time caught using mindmeld)NodeContext: Sudden sharp anger. Caught the player trying to read her thoughts.

IVB_CFM_Box_92.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_92.text: It's nothing, trust me. Beautiful evening, isn't it?
IVB_CFM_Box_92.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval greater than 10 for the player.NodeContext: Airy, deflecting.

IVB_CFM_Box_84.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_84.text: Never mind. Private matter, that's all.
IVB_CFM_Box_84.context: InternalNodeContext: If SH approval of player is greater than 0 but less than 10NodeContext: Firm but reasonably polite shut-down

IVB_CFM_Box_102.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_102.text: Now, how're you faring this evening?
IVB_CFM_Box_102.context: NodeContext: Airy.Very consciously changing the subject from what the player asked about.

IVB_CFM_Box_15.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_15.text: Don't change the subject - tell me about the artefact.

IVB_CFM_Box_11.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_11.text: I've told you all I'm going to tell you. Now please don't pry any further, or you might force me to become less polite.

IVB_CFM_Box_25.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_25.text: Good. Now I believe I was asking you how you were this evening?
IVB_CFM_Box_25.context: NodeContext: Defusing. Returning to the previous topic

IVB_CFM_Box_3.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_3.text: Better than I'd have expected, all things considered.

IVB_CFM_Box_100.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_100.text: The nomad's life has its charms. You get to meet such interesting people - and sometimes they don't even try to kill you.

IVB_CFM_Box_23.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_23.text: Honestly, the parasite frightens me more than anything else we've encountered.

IVB_CFM_Box_65.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_65.text: I suppose you're right - I'm glad I met you, for one.

IVB_CFM_Box_47.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_47.text: My, quite charming when you want to be, aren't you? Maybe save some for the next time we have to talk our way past a sentry or the like.

IVB_CFM_Box_76.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_76.text: We should get some rest. I doubt tomorrow will be any easier than today.

IVB_CFM_Box_2.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_2.text: Interesting? The company's the worst part, as I see it.

IVB_CFM_Box_58.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_58.text: Honestly? Miserable. I'd rather spend the night just about anywhere else but here.

IVB_CFM_Box_22.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_22.text: Oh. You don't say that because of the company, I hope?

IVB_CFM_Box_87.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_87.text: The company's fine. It's the constant danger and thought of becoming a monster that bothers me.

IVB_CFM_Box_98.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_98.text: I know how you feel, trust me. But there's not much we can do until morning.

IVB_CFM_Box_9.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_9.text: No. Especially not when I have you around.

IVB_CFM_Box_24.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_24.text: Oh stop, you can hardly be that miserable if you have energy for flirting.

IVB_CFM_Box_5.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_5.text: You should get some rest. Things will seem better come morning. I hope.

IVB_CFM_Box_59.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_59.text: Hmm. In that case, let me spare you the worst. Good night.

IVB_CFM_Box_97.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_97.text: Not good enough. I want answers.

IVB_CFM_Box_4.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_4.text: Then go read a book, or pray to your god of choice - just leave me alone.

IVB_CFM_Box_55.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_55.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval less than 0  for the player

IVB_CFM_Box_81.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_81.text: I'm being interrupted, that's what. We can talk later.

IVB_CFM_Box_13.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_13.text: No need to be so secretive. You can trust me.

IVB_CFM_Box_104.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_104.text: Our mutual... respect only entitles you to so much. Now, if you don't mind.
IVB_CFM_Box_104.context: NodeContext: Said with a slight bit of coyness. She might like the player quite a bit. But she's playing her cards close.

IVB_CFM_Box_68.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_68.text: A bold statement, if not an accurate one. Leave me be.

IVB_CFM_Box_56.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_56.text: Speak plainly. What are you doing with a gith artefact?

IVB_CFM_Box_31.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_Box_31.text: I said keep out of it. In fact, forget it entirely.

IVB_CFM_Box_48.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_48.text: Let me try - I always enjoy opening up what I'm not supposed to.

IVB_CFM_Box_18.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_Box_18.text: *The box is inscribed with unfamiliar glyphs.*

IVB_CFM_Box_38.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_Box_38.text: What is that you have there?

CFM_Ultimatum_8.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_8.text: You're here. Just like it told me.

CFM_Ultimatum_103.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_103.text: The whispers won't let me sleep. They keep pushing me - to you.

CFM_Ultimatum_56.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_56.text: But if you're dead... maybe it'll go away.

CFM_Ultimatum_20.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_20.text: You're here. Just like it told me you'd be, gith.

CFM_Ultimatum_35.speaker: Narrator
CFM_Ultimatum_35.text: *Your mind rushes into hers - a storm of desperation, confusion and a will other than her own.*
CFM_Ultimatum_35.context: InternalNodeContext: The mind meld narration will only play if the player hasn't met not just Shadowheart, but also Astarion, Wyll and Lae'zel (ie they haven't experienced many of these companion mindmelds yet)

CFM_Ultimatum_124.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_124.text: It took me so long to find you.

CFM_Ultimatum_53.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_53.text: What's wrong? You seem different than before.

CFM_Ultimatum_92.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_92.text: No questions! I can't... concentrate with all these voices! Just listen.

CFM_Ultimatum_32.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_32.text: What is this? Have you been tracking me?

CFM_Ultimatum_69.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_69.text: Quiet! I can't... concentrate with all these voices! Just listen.

CFM_Ultimatum_60.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_60.text: The whispering won't let me sleep. It keeps pushing me - to you.

CFM_Ultimatum_102.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_102.text: Even when I'm awake, I dream. There's blood, there's so much blood.

CFM_Ultimatum_42.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_42.text: You're infected, same as me. How did you get here?

CFM_Ultimatum_48.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_48.text: Say nothing and observe Shadowheart closely.

CFM_Ultimatum_26.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_26.text: I can't sleep. The whispering won't let me. It keeps pushing me - to you.
CFM_Ultimatum_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Idle of Shadowheart causiously standing, in a way that obscures the knife she has tucked into the back of her beltNodeContext: On, " to you" SH's hand drifts toward a knife tucked into her belt at the small her back

CFM_Ultimatum_81.speaker: Lae'zel
CFM_Ultimatum_81.text: The ravings of a lunatic. Strike her down.

CFM_Ultimatum_51.speaker: Karlach
CFM_Ultimatum_51.text: |Karlach get rid of her/hear her out|

CFM_Ultimatum_96.speaker: Astarion
CFM_Ultimatum_96.text: It sounds like death would be a mercy. Let's deliver it.

CFM_Ultimatum_99.speaker: Wyll
CFM_Ultimatum_99.text: Whispering? Her brain's been bugged too.

CFM_Ultimatum_30.speaker: Gale
CFM_Ultimatum_30.text: Careful! She's about to lash out.

CFM_Ultimatum_43.speaker: Narrator
CFM_Ultimatum_43.text: *There is a knife hidden in her belt. Her fingers twitch towards the hilt, ready to draw the blade.*
CFM_Ultimatum_43.context: CinematicNodeContext: The knife has always been there, it's just shown now explicitly by the camera

CFM_Ultimatum_110.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_110.text: I said who are you? Tell me right now.

CFM_Ultimatum_95.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_95.text: You know who I am - you saw inside my head. Shadowheart. We were on the ship together.

CFM_Ultimatum_113.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_113.text: Keep your hands away from that blade.

CFM_Ultimatum_34.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_34.text: They've been in my head ever since... it doesn't matter. They brought me here.

CFM_Ultimatum_83.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_83.text: I keep thinking about the knife going deep. It's the only thing they want me to see.

CFM_Ultimatum_115.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_115.text: And I think they'll stop once I deal with you.

CFM_Ultimatum_58.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_58.text: You can't kill me just because some 'whispers' told you to.

CFM_Ultimatum_74.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_74.text: I can't see anything else! I can't shake it.

CFM_Ultimatum_114.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_114.text: The whispering's already quieter here. Once you're dead, it'll be gone entirely.
CFM_Ultimatum_114.context: NodeContext: SH draws her knife frrom the small of her back

CFM_Ultimatum_31.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_31.text: Threaten me again, and it'll be the last thing you do.

CFM_Ultimatum_79.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_79.text: What else do I do? My head is splitting open. I can't leave. I can't!

CFM_Ultimatum_84.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_84.text: Threaten me again, and it'll be the last thing you do.

CFM_Ultimatum_91.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_91.text: You're exhausted - not thinking straight. You need to rest.

CFM_Ultimatum_4.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_4.text: Rest where? I can't leave. The whispers won't let me leave.

CFM_Ultimatum_28.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_28.text: You can stay here. I'll watch over you.

CFM_Ultimatum_64.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_64.context: NodeContext: SH puts the knife away and calms herself

CFM_Ultimatum_39.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_39.text: It's a little quieter now. Is that what they wanted?

CFM_Ultimatum_97.speaker: Astarion
CFM_Ultimatum_97.text: Some day that soft heart of yours is going to be torn out of your chest.

CFM_Ultimatum_61.speaker: Wyll
CFM_Ultimatum_61.text: Are you feeling all right, miss? Maybe a lie-down's in order...

CFM_Ultimatum_90.speaker: Gale
CFM_Ultimatum_90.text: She needs sleep. And she needs to be closely guarded.

CFM_Ultimatum_33.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_33.text: I can't risk having you around.

CFM_Ultimatum_12.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_12.text: There's something controlling your mind. I can feel it.

CFM_Ultimatum_38.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_38.text: Then how do I make them stop? What do I do?

CFM_Ultimatum_62.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_62.text: Don't do anything rash. There has to be an explanation for this.

CFM_Ultimatum_122.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_122.text: I don't want explanations. I want sleep.

CFM_Ultimatum_111.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_111.text: You're not dealing with anyone. You're leaving - now.

CFM_Ultimatum_117.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_117.text: No. I'm where I need to be.

CFM_Ultimatum_131.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_131.text: There's something controlling your mind. I can feel it.

CFM_Ultimatum_44.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_44.text: Then how do I make them stop? What do I do?

CFM_Ultimatum_6.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_6.text: Is the parasite compelling her to do this? Delve into her mind.

CFM_Ultimatum_130.speaker: Narrator
CFM_Ultimatum_130.text: *Not her tadpole - a chorus of harsh, relentless whispers in her head.*

CFM_Ultimatum_77.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_77.text: Get out of my head! All of you!
CFM_Ultimatum_77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Start on neutral as this can come from two different states: State: Hand Over Hilt/State: Knife Out

CFM_Ultimatum_85.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_85.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Shadowheart takes produces a knife, idlesNodeContext: Shadowheart lunges towards the player with a knife.

CFM_Ultimatum_0.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_0.text: Don't look at me like that. I can't... no.

CFM_Ultimatum_41.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_41.text: Say what you have to say.

CFM_Ultimatum_88.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_88.text: You're not yourself - something's interfering with your thoughts. I can feel it.

CFM_Ultimatum_93.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_93.text: Maybe you're right. But the whispers won't stop.

CFM_Ultimatum_104.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_104.text: Hurting me won't help you. Put down the blade.

CFM_Ultimatum_52.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_52.text: You're hallucinating. The blade isn't real.

CFM_Ultimatum_17.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_17.text: It's not? What are these voices doing to me?

CFM_Ultimatum_68.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_68.text: Now... now what do I do?
CFM_Ultimatum_68.context: NodeContext: SH puts the knife away and calms herself

CFM_Ultimatum_25.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_25.text: You can stay here. I'll watch over you.

CFM_Ultimatum_121.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_121.text: There we go. Clean and deep.

CFM_Ultimatum_40.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_40.text: I'm not pushing. Let's just talk this over.

CFM_Ultimatum_80.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Shadowheart lunges at the player with a knife, cutting them

CFM_Ultimatum_3.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_3.text: Use your connection to her. Delve into her thoughts.

CFM_Ultimatum_11.speaker: Narrator
CFM_Ultimatum_11.text: *A strange miasma clings to her thoughts. Not the tadpole, but your interruption fazes her.*

CFM_Ultimatum_29.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_29.text: Your stance is off. Lower the blade before I take it from you.

CFM_Ultimatum_76.speaker: Player
CFM_Ultimatum_76.text: Say nothing and watch the intruder closely.

CFM_Ultimatum_47.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_47.text: You're here. Just like it told me.
CFM_Ultimatum_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart appears, weapon drawn. Throughout much of the scene, she's on the verge of attacking

CFM_Ultimatum_55.speaker: Shadowheart
CFM_Ultimatum_55.text: You're here. Just like it told me. And with a gith - I should have figured.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_3.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_3.text: You carry a githyanki relic. I will have an explanation - or your head.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: DIR: The player walk into the scene. LZ and SH don't get along, but things seem to be turning violent. Lae'zel and SH both standingNodeContext: Lae'zel and Shadowheart are having an argument. Both are standing.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_144.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_144.text: Walk away. Now. I won't warn you again.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_144.context: NodeContext: Standing her gound, SH looks LZ up and down, ready for a fight.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_43.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_43.text: Relic? This is about that artefact, isn't it?

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_220.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_220.text: That artefact is an heirloom of my people. Likely she spilled githyanki blood in order to steal it. This cannot stand.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_61.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_61.text: Heirloom? Plunder from some conquered realm, more like. This artefact is the only thing keeping us from becoming slaves to our parasites. Be glad I have it.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_161.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_161.text: What's going on? Why're you two arguing?

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_1.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_1.text: She carries an heirloom of our people. She must explain herself.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_1.context: NodeContext: DIR: What SH has done is sacrilege to LZ.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_22.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_22.text: She is deluded - as are you, should you show her your allegiance.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_22.context: NodeContext: Addressing the player in reference to Lae'zel's behaviour.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_238.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_238.context: NodeContext: DIR: Cold, shutting down her emotions as she's readies for a fight.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_239.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_239.text: Lae'zel thinks I have something important to her people. She's deluded, clearly.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_239.context:
NodeContext: Addressing the player in reference to Lae'zel's behaviour.
DIR: Try a take where SH spits out the clearly under her breath as an after thought

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_141.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_141.text: Lies. She carries an heirloom of my people. I must know why.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_121.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_121.text: This matter concerns both of us, kin. Shadowheart has deceived us.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_121.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel addresses a fellow Gith, assuming they will also be interested in Shadowheart' supposed transgression.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_173.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_173.text: Nonsense. You're just finally showing us what you really are - a reaver to the bone.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_173.context: NodeContext: SH addresses Lae'zel, while implicitly trying to rally support from the player observing this argument.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_98.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_98.text: Spare your indignity. Every word that spills from your mouth is worth less than the last.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_199.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_199.text: Again, stop this. No sense in us fighting with each other.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_126.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_126.text: Stop this. No sense in us fighting with each other.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_247.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_247.text: Incorrect. Judicious bloodletting settles feuds and roots out the weak - the deceitful.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_86.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_86.text: Do you hear this tripe? Our lives are at stake, and she wants us to turn on each other.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_18.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_18.text: No others. Just you and me.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_91.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_91.text: I agree with Shadowheart - the artefact is protecting us. We need it with us.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_235.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_235.text: You hear that, Lae'zel? It's called common sense.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_246.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_246.text: Tsk. You seek reason in dishonour.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_110.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_110.text: Lae'zel is right. We don't need the githyanki as enemies.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_178.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_178.text: It's too late - you can't appease them. We have to do what's right for us. The artefact stays with me.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_96.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_96.text: You think this can be settled with just words? No. Honour demands I take something from you.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_92.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_92.text: So. Any ideas on how we settle this?

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_130.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_130.text: The bad blood must be purged. A duel, come first light.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_87.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_87.text: You mean I'd get to prove you wrong and thrash you? I love it.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_11.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_11.text: Get some rest, Lae'zel - you'll need it.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_243.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to sleep. InternalNodeContext: Cinematics indicate that a period of time has passed. It's now later in the night, after everyone has (seemingly) gone to sleepNodeContext: Cinematics indicate that a period of time has passed. It's now later in the night, after everyone has (seemingly) gone to sleep

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_113.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_113.text: The truth, now. Or vermin will feast on your carcass.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_113.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player awakes to find Lae'zel is on top of SH, a dagger pressed to her throat/chest (whichever works better). The rest of the scene plays out with Lae'zel over a prone Shadowheart, unless SH manages to get to her feet before combat (which will be noted in the specific nodes).
NodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, having awoken to find Lae'zel crouched over her with a dagger held to her throat.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_154.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_154.text: I should have seen this coming, coward.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_154.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_181.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stabs Shadowheart, who utters a sharp gasp and dies.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_33.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_33.text: For you, my queen: a thief's blood!
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: A tadpole emerges from Shadowheart's corpse. Lae'zel crushes it under her foot.InternalNodeContext: This will be followed by a separate dialogue where another Absolute vision occurs, followed by a daisy intervention.NodeContext: Sotto voce. A dedication/blood sacrifice for the gith queen, Vlaakith.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_120.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_120.text: Lae'zel - stop. Before you do something you'll regret.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_168.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_168.text: Lae'zel - stop. Before you do something you'll regret.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_8.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_8.text: Your petty quarrels disturbed my rest. Stop at once, or I will make you stop.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_224.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_224.text: You're lucky I respect them. One more chance, then - tell me about the relic.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_224.context: NodeContext: him / her references the player

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_77.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_77.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_159.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_159.text: You must. Or you will take your secrets to the grave.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_159.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.NodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_153.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_153.text: I can't tell what I don't know. Shar willed it, so I obeyed.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_153.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.NodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_88.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_88.text: I can't tell what I don't know. My goddess willed it, so I obeyed.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.NodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_162.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_162.text: Many of us were sent to take it from your kin. I'm the last one left.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_162.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.NodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_53.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_53.text: I don't know what it is, what it does... I just have to get it to Baldur's Gate.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.NodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_32.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_32.text: Stand down, Lae'zel. You've gotten what you wanted.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_58.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_58.text: For now. Perhaps we can put our differences aside, out of mutual self-interest.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her. Lae'zel addresses the player first then turns to Shadowheart for 2nd sentence. Lae'zel stands up, stepping back from SH.NodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her. Lae'zel addresses the player first then turns to Shadowheart for 2nd sentence

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_5.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_5.text: But there will come a time when I must attend to the artefact's occupant. You'd be a fool to intervene.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_63.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_63.text: Should that fail... at least I know you are a deep sleeper.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_63.context: NodeContext: Calling a truce with SH, with a not-so-veiled threat at the end.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_145.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_145.text: That's all? There has to be more.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_147.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_147.text: This suffices for now. Perhaps we can put our differences aside, out of mutual self-interest.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_147.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her. Lae'zel addresses the player first then turns to Shadowheart for 2nd sentence. Lae'zel stands up, stepping back from SH.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_134.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel turns from Shadowheart to rebuke the player

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_167.text: Should've kept your focus on me.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_182.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel addresses the player upon their intervention

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_148.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_148.text: You should have taken your own advice.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_148.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart slips back from Lae'zel. gets to her feet and attacks.NodeContext: Grim resolve. Takes advantage of Lae'zel's split attention. She lashes out and manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_255.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel is lying on the ground where she awoke. Shadowheart is crouched over her, holding her at knifepoint.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_245.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_245.text: If anyone asks, I'll say you were transforming. Don't expect to be mourned.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_245.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel is lying on the ground where she awoke. Shadowheart is crouched over her, holding her at knifepoint.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_242.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart stabs Lae'zel, who utters a sharp gasp and dies.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_131.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_131.text: Take this slain foe as a gift, blessed Nightsinger. Usher her into your darkness.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_260.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_260.text: Shadowheart - stop. You don't have to do this.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_57.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_57.text: Shadowheart - stop. You don't have to do this.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_184.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_184.text: She's a liability - it's the artefact we need, not her -
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_184.context: NodeContext: SH looks over to the player.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_217.text: Let me up, and I'll show you.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_217.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel is lying on the ground where she awoke. Shadowheart is crouched over her, holding her at knifepoint.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_276.speaker: Player

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_143.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is lying on the ground where she awoke. Shadowheart is crouched over her, holding her at knifepoint.NodeContext: Lae'zel is lying on the ground where she awoke. Shadowheart is crouched over her, holding her at knifepoint.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_174.context:

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_207.text: We need her, Shadowheart. Give her a chance.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_137.text: Can I do that, Lae'zel? Can I turn my back on you?

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_275.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_275.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel attacks while Shadowheart is distracted. Then she manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.NodeContext: Grim resolve. She attacks Shadowheart, who is momentarily distracted. Then she manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_176.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_176.text: Rest - both of you. Tempers will be cooler in the morning.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_127.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_127.text: I doubt this one's wits will be any sharper by then.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_35.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_35.text: I do not wish to spill blood here. Come daylight, we will find a place to end this.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_19.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_19.text: Fine. You can accept you're wrong, or we'll be rid of you permanently. Either way, I win.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_225.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_225.text: Remove yourself, if you are so easily offended. This is not your concern.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_225.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel speaking to the player (stay out of it - this is between me and SH)

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_66.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_66.text: You have something precious to my kin - an heirloom. I will have it back.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_119.speaker: Player
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_119.text: Leave them to settle their differences and go to sleep.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_94.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel and SH both standingNodeContext: Lae'zel approaches Shadowheart - she's got questions. Both are standing.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_30.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_30.text: *Shadowheart keeps one hand on something hidden beneath her clothing.*

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_107.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_107.text: I don't know what qualifies as manners with your kind, but in Faerûn it's rude to stare.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_128.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_128.text: What exactly were you doing before the ghaik seized you?

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_25.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_25.text: Now why would you ask me a question like that?

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_191.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_191.text: I am merely curious about my travelling companion.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_106.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_106.text: Lae'zel. You're not really the type for idle chatter. Don't develop the habit now.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_152.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_152.text: I know you have something precious to my kin. Explain yourself.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_133.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_133.text: I don't know what you're talking about. I suspect you don't know what you're talking about.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_257.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_257.text: I will have an explanation from you, or I will have your head.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_262.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_262.text: Fine. It's a lucky keepsake, nothing more. I found it in a flea market.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_268.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_268.text: If that is true, you will have no qualms with showing it to me.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_54.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_54.text: Another time, I'm terribly tired. You should get some rest, Lae'zel.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_165.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_165.text: Sssh... don't call out. Don't move.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_165.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Shadowheart, who is crouched over her.NodeContext: Shadowheart is in control, speaking in a threatening whisper. Lae'zel is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Shadowheart, who is crouched over her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_101.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_101.text: I needn't have woken you at all. I could've just buried this dagger in your throat.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Shadowheart, who is crouched over her.NodeContext: Shadowheart is in control, speaking in a threatening whisper. Lae'zel is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Shadowheart, who is crouched over her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kicks out from underneath Shadowheart and pull her weapon out.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_279.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_279.text: I don't care what you believe, Lae'zel. Go to sleep.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_237.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_237.text: Let the matter drop for now.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_140.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_140.text: You're welcome to try. Otherwise, back off.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_26.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_26.text: Use the parasite. Probe her thoughts.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_265.speaker: Narrator
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_265.text: *You sense her fear - that you will try to take the heirloom.*

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_232.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_232.text: If you explain yourself, perhaps I will allow you to keep the heirloom.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_236.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_236.text: Agh... I felt that. Get away from me, gith!

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_188.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_188.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel and SH both standingNodeContext: Lae'zel approaches Shadowheart - she's got questions. Both are standing.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_79.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_79.text: The artefact you possess contains someone important - someone I may need to free.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_20.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_20.text: The artefact you possess contains someone important - someone my queen demands to be slain.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_50.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_50.text: Tell me what you are doing with it.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_273.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_273.text: It's my prize. I'll die to protect it.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_249.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_249.text: A relic of my people. An ancient one. Curious, that the one Voss wants me to free should live inside it.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_249.context: NodeContext: Considering a gith artefact being held in her view.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_202.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_202.text: A relic of my people. An ancient one. Curious, that the one I'm to kill should be living inside it.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_202.context: NodeContext: Considering a gith artefact being held in her view.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_138.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_138.text: Simply vexed. Anger would be impractical.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_251.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_251.text: The artefact is closed to me. But its protection is an advantage - as is having a skilful cleric at my side.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_171.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_171.text: But I will attend to the Prism's occupant, in time. Perhaps your mission can still be fulfilled... but it will not come at the cost of mine.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_270.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_270.text: But make no mistake - I will slay the Prism's occupant, as Vlaakith's commanded. Perhaps your mission can still be fulfilled... but it will not come at the cost of mine.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_93.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_93.text: It is for other gith to hunt and punish you. And they will, knowing my kin.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_28.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_28.text: But it is not my mission to collect your head. The ghaik parasites come first.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_69.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_69.text: I am content. Go, rest. Dawn breaks all too soon.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_118.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_118.text: Tuck the relic away and turn to leave.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_99.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_99.text: In time, I will free the occupant of that artefact. You'd be foolish indeed to intervene.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_42.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_42.text: In time, I will slay the occupant of that artefact. You'd be foolish indeed to intervene.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_271.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_271.text: Your contraband does not concern me, but it may concern my kin. Assume you are being hunted.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_254.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_254.text: Hm. A creation of my people, though I cannot decipher writing this ancient.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_254.context: NodeContext: Considering a gith artefact being held in her view.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_116.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_116.text: Keep it. Do what you will with it.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_175.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_175.text: Unfortunate. I thought you may have some honour.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_51.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_51.text: Go, rest. But do not consider this matter settled.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_71.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Shadowheart awakening to find Lae'zel perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_278.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_278.text: Sssh... do not move. Do not cry out. Or I will open your neck.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_278.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel is in control, speaking in a threatening whisper. Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart kicks out from underneath Laezel and pull her weapon out.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_269.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_269.text: You have lied about the heirloom. I will have the truth, or I will have your life.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_47.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_47.text: A sorry tale. Barely worth interrogating you over. Show me the heirloom.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_222.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_222.text: No matter. I can examine it for myself. Be still and this will be quick.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_244.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_244.text: A relic of my people. An ancient one. Curious, that the one Voss wants me to free should live inside it.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_244.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_157.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_157.text: A relic of my people. An ancient one. Curious, that the one I'm to kill should be living inside it.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_157.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_136.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_136.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart puts puzzle box away.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_211.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_211.text: Hm. A creation of my people, though I cannot decipher writing this ancient.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_211.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.NodeContext: Curious, but not breathtaken.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_7.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_7.text: Keep it. Do what you will with it.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart puts puzzle box away.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_158.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_158.text: Wait. You held a blade to my throat over this, and now you don't care?

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_124.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_124.text: The artefact is closed to me. But its protection is an advantage - as is having a skilful cleric at my side.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_221.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_221.text: But I will attend to the Prism's occupant, in time. Perhaps your mission can still be fulfilled... but it will not come at the cost of mine.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_169.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_169.text: But make no mistake - I will slay the Prism's occupant, as Vlaakith's commanded. Perhaps your mission can still be fulfilled... but it will not come at the cost of mine.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_198.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_198.text: Purification is my mission - not your contraband. I am content for the time being.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_23.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_23.text: But beware. My kin undoubtedly hunt you. If caught, your death will be slow, exquisite.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_23.context: NodeContext: 'You'll get what's coming to you. Rest assured'.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_112.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_112.text: Rest. Dawn breaks all too soon.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_112.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel departs for her bedroll.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_264.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_264.text: Ha! Very well, let us make this interesting.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_264.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart rushes Laezel, weapon ready.NodeContext: Lae'zel prepares to fight.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_201.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel rushes Shadowheart, stabbing her below the ribcage, Shadowheat falls to the ground. Leaving her to bleed out (1HP), Lae'zel takes the artefact and moves to leave. As she does so...

The artefact appears to vibrate in her hands. Lae'zel has just enough time to cock her head and look at the item quizically before a blast of pisonic energy overcomes her. In a wider angle, the psionic explosion engulfs her. Shadowheart, still on the ground, is splattered with Lae'zel's blood.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_233.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_233.text: Offer her a half-truth. Say you found it on a dead gith.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_156.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_156.text: Perhaps this is so. Show me the heirloom.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_179.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_179.text: I am certain you did. And now I shall find it in turn, on a dead half-elf.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_84.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_84.text: Do your worst. I won't tell you anything.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_218.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_218.text: My worst is for worthy foes. This will have to suffice.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_258.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_258.text: I still could. Then no more Lae'zel to pry into my affairs...

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_14.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_14.text: Good. This little venture would be duller without you, I'll admit.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_17.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_17.text: My Creed forbids such weakness. Explain yourself - and then try to kill me.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_64.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_64.text: Persistent, aren't you? Under different circumstances, I'm sure we'd get on quite well.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_177.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_177.text: There. Is that worth your life?
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_177.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reveals box, still holding Lae'zel at knifepoiint.NodeContext: Shadowheart holds up the box (approx rubik's cube size) with her free hand while keeping her blade out.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_100.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_100.text: I don't care about the relic, only the occupant inside it. Keep it with you.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_190.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_190.text: The relic is gith, but means nothing to me. You can do with it as you like.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_263.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_263.text: Hmm. You seem sincere, oddly enough. Let's say we have an understanding.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_219.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_219.text: But if you break your promise, I'll kill you. Sleep well.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_219.context: CinematicNodeContext: LZ and SH put their weapons away and SH leaves.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_70.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_70.text: But if that comes into doubt, I'll kill you. Sleep well.
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_70.context: CinematicNodeContext: LZ and SH put their weapons away and SH leaves.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_16.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_16.text: The gith you took this from will hunt you down and kill you. Slowly.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_206.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_206.text: They are more than welcome to try.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel charges Shadowheat, knife out.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_252.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_252.text: You talk a great deal for a would-be murderer. Get on with it, if you dare try.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_210.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_210.text: That heirloom is as much my affair as it is yours.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_10.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_10.text: I'll kill you if necessary. But explaining your corpse would be a chore.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_229.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_229.text: If I knew you weren't a threat to me - to my mission - then perhaps we could make peace.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_55.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_55.text: So. Can you let the matter drop, or should I put you back to sleep permanently?

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_151.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_151.text: You've been misinformed. By who, I wonder?

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_180.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_180.text: And yet here I stand. Concerned.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_90.speaker: Shadowheart
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_90.text: It's nothing. A lucky keepsake I found in some ruins.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_160.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_160.text: A keepsake. Very well. Perhaps I was misinformed.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_192.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_192.text: We shall see. Now let us rest.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_109.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_109.text: Your lies are not as cunning as you think, istik. Show me this 'keepsake'.

IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_36.speaker: Lae'zel
IVB_CFM_LaezelFight_36.text: I know the gith heirloom you possess must be important to my kin. As I know they would not yield it willingly to you.
